example.text: Meanwhile, House Republicans are pushing a bill that neglects the people behind immigration policy. The Child Deportation Act embraces the same failed, xenophobic policies that promise harsh enforcement and nothing more. It is not a real solution.

It will facilitate opportunities for students to meet with individuals currently serving in Congress, and also the former Members because we are still important, including our staff, both in Washington and in the district offices. It will create a one-semester fellowship for four and six students, which would include a semester internship at the FMC office here in downtown Washington, DC; scheduling meetings each week with current and former Members and staff and ambassadors and embassy staff here in DC on how to pursue the careers in public service; of course, free time on weekends so they can go and see everything that you Irish leaders all want to go and see.
